Bulma Tags

Bulma tags are used in a few different layouts in Bulma Clean Theme, so it has been extracted as itâ€™s own component. You can create a tag in your own pages using the below include tag.

An example tag

Tag Include

To include a tag use the following include.

{% include tag.html tag="The tag text" %}

You can overwrite the default style (is-primary) by passing in the style in the include tag.

{% include tag.html tag="The tag text" style="is-light" %}
